roleset.name: cause amazement
roleset.note: DAZZLE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'dazzle' based on sentences in wsj; nominal 'dazzling' based on BOLT-7. Member of VNcls amuse-31.1. (from dazzle.01-v)
DAZZLING-N NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from dazzling.01-n)

example.name: dazzle-v: two args
example.text: We-1 here in the affected areas were dazzled [*-1] by Mr. Laband's analysis of time values and his comparisons of effectiveness concerning research and development.
example.arg: by Mr. Laband's analysis of time values and his comparisons of effectiveness concerning research and development

example.name: ARG2
example.text: But when the subject of the Peasants Association comes up , and when talked about how she was organizing peasants and helping them improve the quality -LRB- of their lives -RRB- , Zheng Bing 's face lights up with a dazzling smile .

example.name: dazzling-n
example.text: At length one night, hearing the voices very distinctly, I crept out, and by the dazzling of the water could see as it were a fleet of beats sailing up and down the lake, not far from the bridge;
